definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Mollen first joined the U.S. Department of State in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 莫倫初次到美國國務院工作是在2002年。

sentences.english: The U. S. State Department issues a travel warning -- to the world.
sentences.chinese: 美國國務院向全世界發佈了旅行警告。

sentences.english: Is the State Department or who is supporting this initiative?
sentences.chinese: 是美國國務院還是誰在支持這項倡議？

sentences.english: The US State Department said the move was counter-productive.
sentences.chinese: 美國國務院表示，此舉動會影響和平進程。

sentences.english: The spokesman for the State Department excepted to the statement.
sentences.chinese: 美國國務院發言人反對此項聲明。

sentences.english: But Kusa has stopped answering the phone, according to the U.S. State Department.
sentences.chinese: 然而據美國國務院稱，庫薩已不再接電話。

sentences.english: This podcast is produced by the U.S. Department of State’s Bureau of International Information Programs.
sentences.chinese: 本播客系由美國國務院國際信息局製作。

definition: Netanyahu (name)/Benjamin Netanyahu (1949-), Israeli Likud politician, prime minister 1996-1999 and from 2009
Edward Snowden (1983-), American surveillance program whistleblower
François Hollande (1954-), French Socialist politician, president of France 2012-2017

pinyin: Ao4 da4 li4 ya4 Lian2 bang1
